analysisType.description: Number of Buildings and USD damages
analysisType.title: Schools

hazardSet.abstract: This spreadsheet shows Capital Stock losses for schools for return periods 10, 25, 50 ,100, 250, 500, 1000, 2500 years in Afghanistan provinces expressed in USD, and normalising to the 2016 value. This includes 6 scenarios as described in the final report, with one base scenario and also 5 subsequent scenarios. In spreadsheet 1, the PML curves and the AALs for each scenario are given. In spreadsheet 2 and 3, different representations of the PML data, and in spreadsheet 4 and 5, the economic AALs per spatial unit, and a summary of the fatality results.
hazardSet.title: Afghanistan PML Spreadsheet including national level results for the schools risk assessment.

analysisType.name: schools
